TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileVersionInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: ディスク上の物理ファイルのバージョン情報を提供します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". A file version number is a 64\-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
- The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
- The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
- The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
- The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.
Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> method of this class to get a <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> containing information about a file, then look at the properties for information about the file. The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion%2A> property provides version information about the file. The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion%2A> properties provide version information for the product that the specified file is a part of. Call <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ToString%2A> to get a partial list of properties and their values for this file.
The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> properties are based on version resource information built into the file. Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information.
Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. For example the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A> property reflects the **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** flag value in the file's **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** block, which is built from the **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** resource in a Win32 resource file. For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see "About Resource Files" and "VERSIONINFO Resource" in the Platform SDK. For more information about specifying version resources in a .NET module, see the [Setting Assembly Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/36a98a81-b5b5-4c19-912a-11f91eff7f4e) topic.
> [!NOTE] > This class makes a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full trust permission. For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/a33fd5f9-2de9-4653-a4f0-d9df25082c4d).
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it prints the file description and version number in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
[!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.permission: for full trust for the immediate caller. This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Docs.value: ファイルに関連付けられているコメント。ファイルにバージョン情報が含まれていない場合は 。

remarks.format:

Docs.value: ファイルのビルド番号を表す値。ファイルにバージョン情報が含まれていない場合は 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". A file version number is a 64\-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows:
- The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart%2A> number.
- The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart%2A> number.
- The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> number.
- The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the third set of 16 bits.
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart%2A> in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo GetVersionInfo(string fileName) cil managed

Docs.param: バージョン情報を取得するファイルの絶対パスおよびファイル名。
Docs.summary: 指定されたファイルに関連付けられているバージョン情報を表す を返します。
Docs.returns: ファイルについての情報が格納されている 。 ファイルにバージョン情報が含まれていない場合、 には要求されたファイルの名前のみが含まれます。

remarks.format:
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for Notepad and displays the file description and version number in the console window.

for full trust for the immediate caller. This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Docs.value: ファイルの内部名。 内部名が存在しない場合は、このプロパティには、拡張子が付かない元のファイル名が格納されます。

Docs.value: ファイルにデバッグ情報を格納する場合、またはデバッグ機能を有効にしてコンパイルする場合は 。それ以外の場合は 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> properties are based on version resource information built into the file. Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information.
Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. The <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A> property reflects the **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** flag value in the file's **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** block, which is built from the **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** resource in a Win32 resource file. For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see the Platform SDK **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** topic and **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** topic topics.
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it displays the state of the Boolean <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug%2A> in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.

Docs.value: このファイルがプライベートにビルドされたファイルの場合は 。ファイルが標準リリース プロシージャを使用して作成された場合、またはファイルにバージョン情報が含まれていない場合は 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 If this value is **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** , <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild%2A> will describe how this version of the file differs from the standard version.
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it displays the private build information in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
[!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: ファイルが特殊なビルドかどうかを指定する値を取得します。
Docs.value: ファイルが特殊なビルドの場合は 。それ以外の場合は 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 A file that is a special build was built using standard release procedures, but the file differs from a standard file of the same version number. If this value is **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** , the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild%2A> property must specify how this file differs from the standard version.
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it displays whether this version is a special build version in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
[!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: 指定されたファイルに適用される著作権表記をすべて取得します。
Docs.value: 指定されたファイルに適用される著作権表記。

remarks.format:
## 解説 This should include the full text of all notices, legal symbols, copyright dates, and so on or **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** if the file did not contain version information.
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.LegalCopyright%2A> in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.

Docs.summary: ファイルに適用される商標と登録商標を取得します。
Docs.value: ファイルに適用される商標と登録商標。ファイルにバージョン情報が含まれていない場合は 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 法的商標には、すべての通知、法的な記号、および商標番号の完全なテキストが含まれます。
## 例 次の例では<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A>を取得する、<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo>メモ帳にします。 出力し、<xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.LegalTrademarks%2A>テキスト ボックスにします。 このコード`textBox1`がインスタンス化されています。

Docs.summary: ファイルのプライベート バージョンについての情報を取得します。
Docs.value: ファイルのプライベート バージョンについての情報。ファイルにバージョン情報が含まれていない場合は 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 This information is present when <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild%2A> is **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** .
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it prints the private build information in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
[!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: このファイルに関連付けられている製品のビルド番号を取得します。
Docs.value: このファイルに関連付けられている製品のビルド番号を表す値。ファイルにバージョン情報が含まれていない場合は 。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". A product version number is a 64\-bit number that holds the version number as follows:
- The first 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart%2A> number.
- The next 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart%2A> number.
- The third set of 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> number.
- The last 16 bits are the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart%2A> number.
This property gets the third set of 16 bits.
## 例 The following example calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo%2A> to get the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo> for the Notepad. Then it prints the <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart%2A> in a text box. This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
[!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
